33-year-old.context: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

Caucasian male.context: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

hoarseness.context: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

bilateral true vocal cord lesions.context: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

leukoplakia.context: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

redundant false vocal cords.context: The patient's larynx was then brought into view with the true vocal cords hidden underneath what appeared to be redundant false vocal cords.

extensive area of leukoplakia.context: The left true vocal cord was then first addressed and appeared to have an extensive area of leukoplakia extending from the posterior one-third up to the anterior third.

fullness in the subglottic region.context: The false vocal cord also appeared to be very full on the left side along with fullness in the subglottic region.

cobblestoned in appearance.context: The areas of leukoplakia appeared to be cobblestoned in appearance, irregularly bordered, and very hard to the touch.

Microscopic suspension direct laryngosco.context: Procedure Performed: Microscopic suspension direct laryngoscopy with biopsy of left true vocal cord stripping.

Decadron.context: The patient did receive intraoperatively 10 mg of Decadron.

Medrol DOSEPAK.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.

Tylenol with Codeine.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.

amoxicillin.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.
